changes: Fixed a bug that caused the useFocusTrap hook to not work properly when a custom element was passed as content in the elvia-modal component.
Redefined api for useConnectedOverlay to return an object
Added hook useLongPress to detect long presses on elements.
fixes: Change response from useConnectedOverlay to an object, instead of an array.

changes: Added reusable hook useFocusTrap to manage focus trapping.
Added method for checking server side rendering
Added reusable hook useConnectedOverlay to manage overlay positioning.
Removed default export of toolbox file, to make API surface and architecture more modular.
fixes: Import the tool you use directly, instead of using a default import. import toolbox from '@elvia/elvis-toolbox'; becomes import { throttle } from '@elvia/elvis-toolbox';

changes: Added a check if the variable window exists when checking if localhost in warnDeprecatedProps to make SSR work.
Changed the types of the deprecation function parameters to accommodate more functionality.
Added helper function to show deprecation warnings when deprecated props are used in components.
